text: movunge at karana lada (napuru) kriyavanhi hetuven movunva yamkisi vipatak pæmina sendu vana vita, “apage deviyane! apa veta (obage) ek dutayeku yæviya yutu noveda? (ese oba yava tibune nam), obage ayavan api anugamanaya kara (obata) visvasaya tæbuvangen vu aya vasayen sita ættemu” yayi pavasa nositima pinisama, (obava apage dutaya vasayen movun veta yævvemu)
